mtl_features.json: Optional features for the Metal renderer.

features.name: has_base_vertex_instanced_draw
description: The renderer supports base vertex instanced draw

features.name: has_explicit_mem_barrier
description: The renderer supports explicit memory barrier

features.name: has_cheap_render_pass
description: The renderer can cheaply break a render pass.

features.name: has_non_uniform_dispatch
description: The renderer supports non uniform compute shader dispatch's group size

features.name: has_shader_stencil_output
description: The renderer supports stencil output from fragment shader

features.name: has_texture_swizzle
description: The renderer supports texture swizzle

features.name: has_depth_auto_resolve
description: The renderer supports MSAA depth auto resolve at the end of render pass

features.name: has_stencil_auto_resolve
description: The renderer supports MSAA stencil auto resolve at the end of render pass

features.name: has_events
description: The renderer supports MTL(Shared)Event

features.name: has_variable_rasterization_rate
description: The renderer supports variable rasterization rate

features.name: allow_inline_const_vertex_data
description: The renderer supports using inline constant data for small client vertex data

features.name: allow_separate_depth_stencil_buffers
description: Some Apple platforms such as iOS allows separate depth and stencil buffers,
whereas others such as macOS don't

features.name: allow_runtime_sampler_compare_mode
description: The renderer supports changing sampler's compare mode outside shaders

features.name: allow_sampler_compare_gradient
description: The renderer supports sample_compare with gradients

features.name: allow_sampler_compare_lod
description: The renderer supports sample_compare with lod

features.name: allow_buffer_read_write
description: The renderer supports buffer read and write in the same shader

features.name: allow_multisample_store_and_resolve
description: The renderer supports MSAA store and resolve in the same pass

features.name: allow_gen_multiple_mips_per_pass
description: The renderer supports generating multiple mipmaps per pass

features.name: force_D24S8_as_unsupported
description: Force Depth24Stencil8 format as unsupported.

features.name: force_buffer_GPU_storage
description: On systems that support both buffer' memory allocation on GPU and shared memory (such as
macOS), force using GPU memory allocation for buffers everytime or not.

features.name: force_non_CS_base_mipmap_generation
description: Turn this feature on to disallow Compute Shader based mipmap generation. Compute Shader
based mipmap generation might cause GPU hang on some older iOS devices.

features.name: emulate_transform_feedback
description: Turn this on to allow transform feedback in Metal using a 2-pass VS for GLES3.

features.name: intel_explicit_bool_cast_workaround
description: Insert explicit casts for float/double/unsigned/signed int on macOS 10.15 with Intel
driver

features.name: intel_disable_fast_math
description: Disable fast math in atan and invariance cases when running below macOS 12.0

features.name: allow_renderpass_without_attachment
description: Allow creation of render passes without any attachments

features.name: avoid_stencil_texture_swizzle
description: Do not create swizzled views of stencil textures

features.name: emulate_alpha_to_coverage
description: Some GPUs ignore alpha-to-coverage when [[sample_mask]] is written

features.name: write_helper_sample_mask
description: Some GPUs produce incorrect derivatives unless [[sample_mask]] is written

features.name: pre_transform_texture_cube_grad_derivatives
description: Apply a vendor-specific transformation to explicit cubemap derivatives

features.name: multisample_color_format_shader_read_workaround
description: Add shaderRead usage to some multisampled texture formats

features.name: copy_IOSurface_to_non_IOSurface_for_read_optimization
description: some GPUs are faster to read an IOSurface texture by first copying the texture to a
non-IOSurface texture

features.name: copy_texture_to_buffer_for_read_optimization
description: some GPUs are faster to read a texture by first copying the texture to a buffer

features.name: limit_max_draw_buffers_for_testing
description: Used to check the backend works when the device's advertized limit is less than the code's limit

features.name: limit_max_color_target_bits_for_testing
description: Metal iOS has a limit on the number of color target bits per pixel.

features.name: preemptively_start_provoking_vertex_command_buffer
description: AMD Metal Drivers appear to have a bug this works around

features.name: upload_data_to_iosurfaces_with_staging_buffers
description: When uploading data to IOSurface-backed textures, use a staging buffer.

features.name: always_use_staged_buffer_updates
description: Always update buffers by copying the data to a staging buffer and then blitting it to the actual buffer

features.name: use_shadow_buffers_when_appropriate
description: On some architectures using a shadow buffer can be faster for certain size buffers

features.name: always_use_managed_storage_mode_for_buffers
description: Metal buffers can be managed, shared, or private. Sometimes managed is fastest

features.name: always_use_shared_storage_mode_for_buffers
description: Metal buffers can be managed, shared, or private. Sometimes shared is fastest

features.name: prefer_cpu_for_buffersubdata
description: Makes bufferSubData always update via CPU

features.name: disable_programmable_blending
description: Disable programmable blending in order to test read_write pixel local storage textures

features.name: disable_r_w_texture_tier2_support
description: Disable tier2 read_write textures in order to test tier1 support

features.name: disable_raster_order_groups
description: Disable raster order groups in order to test pixel local storage memory barriers

features.name: enable_in_memory_mtl_library_cache
description: Cache MTLLibrary objects in memory.

features.name: enable_parallel_mtl_library_compilation
description: Compile MTLLibrary in multiple threads.

features.name: always_prefer_staged_texture_uploads
description: Always prefer to upload texture data via a staging buffer and avoid MTLTexture::replaceRegion.

features.name: disable_staged_initialization_of_packed_texture_formats
description: Staged GPU upload of some packed texture formats such as RGB9_E5 fail on Intel GPUs.

features.name: compile_metal_shaders
description: Compiles metal shaders using command line tools and saves to BlobCache.
Requires using --no-sandbox and disabling enableParallelMtlLibraryCompilation.

features.name: load_metal_shaders_from_blob_cache
description: Loads metal shaders from blob cache. Useful if compile_metal_shaders was used to
generate shaders.

features.name: print_metal_shaders
description: Prints the source to a shader before it's compiled.

features.name: generate_shareable_shaders
description: Attempts to generate shaders that are shareable. More specifically, shaders
end up with conditionals that are decided at run time via input parameters vs
compile time. This results in bigger shaders.

features.name: disable_metal_on_nvidia
description: NVIDIA GPUs are unsupported due to scarcity of the hardware.

features.name: flush_after_stream_vertex_data
description: Flush after calls to StreamVertexData to work around driver bugs.

features.name: require_gpu_family_2
description: Mac GPU Family 2 is required to support all the features of OpenGL ES 2.0

features.name: require_msl_2_1
description: MSL 2.1 is required to support all the features of OpenGL ES 2.0

features.name: rescope_global_variables
description: Rescope global variables that are only used in one function to be function-local.

features.name: enable_multisampled_render_to_texture_on_non_tilers
description: Enable EXT_multisampled_render_to_texture on non tiled GPUs.

features.name: inject_asm_statement_into_loop_bodies
description: Inject asm("") statements into loop bodies to force all loops to be treated as
having side effects and not optimized out.
